title: PLAYERS DISCONECTED FROM GAMES
body: MY FRIEND SOMETIMES DISCONECTED FROM GAME BUT HIS NET IS  WORKING FINE .. PLZ FIX THIS BUG AND REMOVE HIS LEAVE BUSTER HE NOT GOING AFK {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Disconnections from matches will have a negative impact on everyone in the match, regardless of the reason for the disconnection. This is one of the reasons why the [Leaverbuster System](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats all disconnections equally and why penalties cannot be removed or modified.

If you can get some more information about the error messages or more of a detailed description of what's going on from your friend, I'll be able to help out more.
